actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of January 2, 1951, also referred to as the Johnson Act, with respect to bona fide vending machines.

summary.text: Makes a technical amendment to the Act of January 2, 1951 (the Johnson Act), to exempt bona fide vending machines and their subassemblies and parts from the prohibition on the interstate transportation of gambling devices.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of January 2, 1951, also referred to as the Johnson Act, with respect to bona fide vending machines.
